name: Bissell Little Green Mini Portable Carpet and Upholstery Deep Cleaner, Car/Auto Detailer, with HydroRinse Self-Cleaning Tool and 4" Tough Stain Tool, Tea Green, 4075
short_description: EVERY PURCHASE SAVES PETS. Every purchase makes it possible for BISSELL to continue our support of BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission of saving pets in need.
SAVE YOUR SANCTUARY: Tackle spills and pet stains while removing dander, dust, and pollen allergens.
CLEANS MORE THAN CARPET: Spray, scrub, and suction to remove embedded dirt and stains from upholstery, car interiors, pet beds, and more.
INCLUDES: 4” Tough Stain Tool with removeable lens, HydroRinse self-cleaning hose tool, and 8oz. BISSELL Little Green Formula.
EASY STORAGE: Conveniently stores in small spaces - perfect for cabinets, closets, and more.
LITTLE GREEN FORMULA: Instantly and permanently removes stains and eliminates everyday household odors.
product_description: Save on space without sacrificing on cleaning ability. Use BISSELL® Little Green® Mini portable upholstery and carpet cleaner to spray, scrub and lift away tough messes, like dirt and stains, from all types of surfaces. Easily access hard-to-clean spaces like staircases or car interiors with Little Green® Mini portable deep cleaner’s lightweight and compact design. Every purchase makes it possible for BISSELL to continue our support of BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission of saving pets in need. Since 2011, BISSELL has donated over $26 million in support of BISSELL Pet Foundation®. When you purchase a BISSELL® product, you help save pets, too. Our products are engineered to clean even the toughest messes so pets can stay at home and out of shelters.

name: BISSELL Little Green Multi-Purpose Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner, Car and Auto Detailer, with Exclusive Specialty Tools, Green, 1400B
short_description: EVERY PURCHASE SAVES PETS. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.
POWERFUL SUCTION. Remove tough pet spots and stains from carpets, upholstery, car interiors, and more.
PORTABLE & VERSATILE DESIGN. Easily clean multiple surfaces throughout the home.
LARGE TANK CAPACITY. 48 oz. tank means you can clean more between refills.
REMOVES STAINS & ODORS. Use Spot & Stain formula with Febreze Freshness to tackle tough stains and odors.
product_description: Not every pet mess calls for a full-size carpet cleaning machine. Use BISSELL® Little Green® portable upholstery and carpet cleaner to spray, scrub and lift away those smaller messes, like dirt and stains, from all types of surfaces. It has powerful suction to easily remove dirty paw prints from carpets and stairs, plus it works on car interiors, too! Little Green® portable deep cleaner is lightweight, so you can use it almost anywhere. And this machine doesn’t just clean up after pets, it helps save them! BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL® product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear. Certain trademarks used under license from The Procter & Gamble Company or its affiliates.

name: Shark StainStriker Portable Carpet Upholstery & Area Rug Cleaner, Bonus XL Tool & Full-Size Cleaning Solution, Stain & Odor Remover, Perfect for Car Interiors, 4 Cleaning Tools, Nordic Blue, PX202BRN
short_description: Shark StainStriker is a portable carpet and upholstery cleaner with pet mess extractor, bonus XL tool, and full-size solutions. Dual-activated formula and ultra-powerful suction remove spots and stains—perfect for pets, cars, and whole-home cleaning.
POWERFUL TOUGH STAIN ELIMINATION: Shark’s dual-activated solution automatically mixes inside the handheld spot & stain remover to deliver 20x more stain-striking power.*
PERFECT FOR PETS: Instantly & permanently removes stubborn, lingering odors – even pet urine and smoke.^
ULTRA-POWERFUL SUCTION: Pulls out embedded spots and stains to deliver like-new results.
WHOLE HOME CLEANING: Designed to remove spots and stains from carpets, area rugs, upholstery, car interiors, and more.
LIGHTWEIGHT & COMPACT DESIGN: At under 9lbs, tackle stains whenever and wherever they happen and conveniently store away when finished.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: Shark StainStriker, Mini Stain Eliminator, 3.5" Stain Eliminator, 7" XL Stain Eliminator, Pet Mess Extractor, 16oz. Deep Clean Pro Formula, 32oz. OXY Multiplier Formula
*vs Shark Deep Clean Pro Formula, ^when using Shark cleaning solution.
product_description: The Shark StainStriker is a portable spot & stain eliminator that delivers unbeatable tough stain elimination, with no premix required Dual-activated solution unleashes the power of OXY delivering 20X more stain-striking power*. Tackle food stains, spills, embedded dirt, & pet messes throughout your home: carpets, area rugs, couches, upholstery & more. Bonus cleaning solutions and accessories.

name: BISSELL® Little Green® Max Pet Portable Carpet and Upholstery Deep Cleaner, Car/Auto Detailer, with Self-Cleaning Tough Stain Tool and Pet Hair Removal Tool (3860)
short_description: EVERY PURCHASE SAVES PETS. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.
SUPERIOR SUCTION. 30% more powerful than the competitive portable deep cleaner.*
INSTANT & PERMANENT PET STAIN REMOVAL. Use with Triple Action PET PRO OXY Spot & Stain formula with Urine Eliminator and StainProtect Technology to protect against future stains.
SELF-CLEANING TOUGH STAIN TOOL. Rinse out left-behind residue, dirt and debris with a one-touch hose and tool cleanout.
EASY TO USE. Longer hose and cord let you easily clean hard-to-reach messes, and the two tank technology simplifies filling and emptying while keeping clean and dirty water separate.
SPRAY, SCRUB, AND SUCTION. TRIPLE ACTION cleaning removes tough set-in pet messes like muddy paw prints, embedded dirt, bio messes, and more.
IN THE BOX: Self-cleaning Tough Stain Tool, Specialized Pet Hair Removal Tool, 8 oz. trial size BISSELL PET PRO OXY Spot & Stain with Urine Eliminator and StainProtect Technology.
product_description: Introducing the BISSELL® Little Green® Max Pet Portable Carpet & Upholstery Deep Cleaner, a cutting-edge machine designed with convenience in mind—especially for pet parents. This innovative cleaner uses a combination of superior suction and scrubbing action to permanently remove tough pet stains on soft surfaces and eliminate odors like pet urine. With a lightweight design, the Little Green® Max Pet is easy to use and store. This machine has a one-touch hose and tool cleaning function to provide a simple "clean-afterthe-clean" experience without having to change out your tool. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL® product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear. *versus Shark® StainStriker™ and Dirt Devil® Portable Deep Cleaner based on ASTM F558 average peak air power through hose with connector covered

name: Portable Carpet & Upholstery Cleaner Machine - 15Kpa Deep Cleaning for Area Rugs, Pets, Couch & Car, Cleaning Machine with Dual Size BrushHead & Self-Cleaning System, Spot Cleaner for Stairs/Furniture
short_description: 【 All-IN-ONE FUNCTION】 The NIQULIT Portable Carpet & Upholstery Spot Cleaner is equipped with a 450W motor, which provides an ultra-strong suction power of 15Kpa, capable of cleaning deeply on the carpet surface. By spraying, brushing, and suction steps, our upholstery cleaner effortlessly tackles food spills, pet stains, and embedded dirt, making it the ultimate carpet cleaner and spot cleaner for any household.

【Removable Large Capacity Dual Water Tanks】 Our portable carpet cleaners come with two large water tanks, including a 1050ml fresh water tank and a 500ml dirty water tank, for long cleaning periods without frequent refills. When using our sofa cleaning machine, you can add our equipped agent to the clean water tank and spray it evenly on the carpet or mat to ensure better cleaning effect. (Tips: Do not exceed the MAX line of the water tank, as it may cause the machine to have no suction)

【Versatile Multi-Scene Cleaning】 With a 5-meter power cord and a 1.6-meter hose, this portable carpet cleaner is ideal for various cleaning scenarios. It comes with a small brush head and a T-shaped brush, perfect for reaching tricky areas like stairs, vehicles, and upholstery. Whether it's for a minor spill or a deep clean, the lightweight vacuum cleaner has you covered.

【 Convenient Storage Design】 This small carpet cleaning machine features a space-saving all-in-one storage system with a compact body that easily hides under sinks or in closet corners. The wires can be easily stored on the bracket of the cleaning machine. The 1.6-meter hose can be neatly stored around the body, and the brush can be stored on the machine's double brush hook. It only takes a few minutes from cleaning to storage, keeping your home space tidy and orderly.

【Easy Maintenance Features】 Post-clean-up should be as easy as the clean itself. Our rug cleaner machine includes a self-cleaning hose function and a removable brush head for cleaning, ensuring that maintenance is hassle-free. Enjoy cleaner surfaces without the worry of cleaning your cleaning machine.

name: HAUSHOF Handheld Carpet Cleaner, 12V Cordless Portable Carpet Cleaner, 6.5KPa Spot Cleaner with 2 Water Tanks, Type-C Charge, Spot & Stain Cleaner, Handheld Upholstery Cleaner for Stairs, Car
short_description: CORDLESS CONVENIENCE: HAUSHOF spot cleaner for carpet and upholstery features a cordless design that lets you grab and go for quick cleanups around your home or car. The built-in lithium battery of the mini shampooer offers lasting runtime, so you’re always ready to clean wherever and whenever, easily tackling hard-to-reach areas like sofas, stairs, corners, and crevices

3-IN-1 DEEP CLEAN: The small carpet cleaner machine features spray, scrub, and suction functions all in one unit, powered by 6.5KPa of strong suction. The mini carpet cleaner tackles tough stains like pet urine, red wine, and coffee spills on various surfaces. With a simple, intuitive process, the spot cleaner helps restore freshness fast- no tool switching, just efficient cleaning

DUAL TANK DESIGN: The handheld carpet cleaner features a 7oz clean water tank and a 12oz dirty water tank, keeping clean and dirty water separate to avoid cross-contamination. The removable tank of cordless carpet cleaner is easy to fill, empty, and rinse, ensuring a more efficient and hygienic cleaning process, so you can feel confident using it in your home

MULTI-FABRIC CLEANER: This hand held carpet cleaner comes with a dedicated powerful multi-fabric cleaner, suitable for various fabric surfaces. The hand held carpet cleaner machine effectively removes stains from mattresses, sofas, fabric chairs, carpets, car seats, etc., without harming fabrics or hands, providing a professional cleaning that leaves your entire home spotless

LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE: This small carpet cleaner weighs only 3.75 lbs, making it easy to carry and tackle hard-to-reach areas. Its compact design ensures simple storage, allowing for easy access whenever needed. The mini carpet cleaner machine is ideal for handling emergencies like pet messes, spills, and other quick cleaning tasks, delivering effortless cleaning and enhanced convenience

TYPE-C CHARGE: This carpet spot cleaner machine features a convenient Type-C charging port and comes with a compatible charging cable. The modern charging design allows for easy and flexible recharging at home or on the go. The handheld upholstery cleaner offers easy charging anytime, anywhere, for a more effortless cleaning experience (Note: Charger adapter is not included)
NOTE: During the suction process, the water level of the sewage should not exceed the maximum limit line. Overflow or foam may spray out.

name: Portable Carpet & Upholstery Spot Cleaner, 15Kpa Powerful Suction & Spot Remover, Deep Stain Cleaning for Carpet, Car Seats, Pets, Stairs, Couches, with Dual Size BrushHead
short_description: 【SUPER LARGE DUAL TANKS】: The Dual Tank System has a large water tank capacity of 0.8L sewage tank and 1.5L clean water tank,respectively,so you can achieve longer uninterrupted cleaning time by separating clean water from dirty water.and the clean water tank can be added our equipped agent and sprayed evenly on the carpet or pad to ensure better cleaning results(Tips: Do not exceed the MAX line of the water tank, as it may cause the machine to have no suction)

【NEW UPGRADE POWERFUL SUCTION】:The Ailltopd Portable Carpet & Upholstery Spot Cleaner is equipped with a 500W motor, which can provide a super suction force of 15Kpa,and you can easily and quickly clean stubborn stains such as dirt, wine, pet feces, etc. on carpets and indoor decorations through spraying, brushing, and suction steps, ensuring that carpets dry quickly after cleaning and quickly return to normal, making your home environment healthier and safer.

【EASY STORAGE & SPACE EFFICIENT】: Its compact size can be stored under a sink or in a closet, without occupying too much home space.and the wires and hoses can be easily stored on the bracket of the cleaning machine.The brush can be stored on the machine's dual brush hook. Don't take up space in the home.

【WIDE APPLICATION RANGE】: The carpet cleaner machine is for fabric cleaning, and cleans most fabric products that cannot be cleaned as a whole, such as sofa, mattresses,car seat,and other difficult to clean items,and is equipped with two sizes of brush heads, which can be used for different areas of stains and can perfectly handle leaks and accidents for you.

【LONGER REACH FOR LARGER CLEANING】: The upholstery cleaner machine with an ultra long hose (4.26ft) and power cord (16.4ft) and the carpet cleaner is lightweight and easy to move from one cleaning job to the next. Please carefully read the instruction manual for specific operating steps. Jump to more product details

name: Dirt Devil Portable Spot Cleaner Machine for Carpet and Upholstery, Powerful Suction Spot Cleaning Machine with Versatile Tools, Pair with Dirt Devil Portable Spot Cleaner Solution
short_description: EASY-TO-USE DESIGN: The Dirt Devil Portable Spot Compact Carpet Cleaning Machine comes with all the features necessary for simple and effective spot cleaning, making refreshing your home easier than ever.

VERSATILE TOOLS: With a 2-in-1 pet tool for erasing pet stains with ease, a 4” stain tool for tackling tough embedded dirt and stains, and a kink-free hose for easy maneuverability and added reach, this spot cleaning machine tackles any mess.

COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT: This small, compact and lightweight spot cleaner provides ultimate portability and easy storage. Refresh carpet, stairs, upholstery and more with this small but mighty machine.

EASY MAINTENANCE: This Dirt Devil spot cleaner machine features a built-in hose rinse and removable lid for easy post cleanup. 19 oz. tank capacity means multiple messes can be tackled without stopping to refill.
DIRT DEVIL CLEANS EVERYTHING: No one wants to spend their entire Saturday afternoon cleaning. With a variety of versatile, effective tools, Dirt Devil helps you get a better clean, faster.
product_description: The Dirt Devil Portable Compact Spot Carpet Cleaner powerfully tackles deep, set-in stains and refreshes your carpets for a quick and easy clean. With tools including a 2-in-1 pet tool for erasing pet stains with ease and a 4” stain tool for tackling tough embedded dirt and stains, this small but mighty machine handles messes like a breeze. Featuring a lightweight construction with easy maintenance features like a built-in hose rinse, this spot cleaner ensures hassle-free cleaning and post-cleanup. Pair with a Dirt Devil portable spot cleaning formula for an easy, efficient clean. From humble beginnings in a Cleveland garage to becoming one of the most popular household vacuum brands in North America, Dirt Devil has come a long way. Over the years, we've worked hard to develop the latest and greatest products that help you get a better clean, faster. No one wants to spend their entire Saturday afternoon cleaning. We know you've got other things to do. But when you have Dirt Devil on your team, five minutes is all you need to get ready for whatever's next.

name: Hoover CleanSlate Plus Portable Carpet + Upholstery Spot Cleaner Machine, Powerful Suction with Versatile Tools, Pet Stain Remover, Car and Auto Detailer, Pair with Hoover Carpet Cleaner Solution
short_description: PORTABLE CARPET CLEANER MACHINE: Quickly remove spills when they happen and tackle tough messes like mud, wine, pet messes and more with the Hoover CleanSlate Plus Carpet Cleaning Machine. Includes trial oxy cleaning solution

TOOLS FOR EVERY MESS: This spot and upholstery cleaner machine can handle any size mess. A 7" WidePath tool quickly cleans large areas while the TightSpot tool reaches into crevices and tough-to-reach places
EASY CLEANING. EASY CLEAN-UP: Use the hose rinse tool to flush the system with fresh water and remove any residual dirt so your machine is always ready to go
DUAL TANK TECHNOLOGY: This Hoover carpet cleaner machine features a dual tank system with 40 oz. clean solution capacity so you can clean further while keeping the clean and dirty water separate

PAIR WITH HOOVER CLEANING SOLUTION: For a bright, refreshed home, use the CleanSlate Plus with a Hoover carpet shampoo solution. Tackle pet messes with our Pet formula or clean everyday stains with our Everyday solutions
product_description: Combining powerful suction and versatile tools, the Hoover CleanSlate Upholstery & Carpet Spot Cleaner permanently removes stains and messes. With our 7" WidePath tool for large areas like stairs and the TightSpot tool for crevices and tough-to-reach areas, this carpet shampooer machine has the flexibility to clean messes of any size. With a light, portable design and long cord, it's perfect for removing spills and stains on the go. Plus, with the Hose Rinse tool, your machine stays clean and ready for the next mess. For more than 100 years, Hoover has designed powerful, easy-to-use products that clean your entire home from floor to ceiling. Since 1908, consumers and businesses have trusted Hoover to provide reliable, innovative cleaning solutions. Today, we offer a comprehensive line of products for general and special-purpose vacuuming, including full-size uprights and canisters, deep cleaners, and hard floor cleaners

name: Bissell SpotClean Pet Pro Portable Carpet Cleaner, 2458
short_description: Professional pet spot cleaner removes tough spots and pet stains from carpet, stairs, upholstery and more.
5 flex hose helps to clean spots and pet stains in hard to reach areas including stairs, upholstery, and area rugs
Pet pro 2458 includes pet stain trapper tool, 3 inch
Long reach 22 power cord. Hose length: 4 feet, power rating: 5.7 amps
2 year limited warranty. Weight: 13.2 lbs
product_description: Bissell SpotClean Pro Pet compact carpet cleaner combines powerful suction, brushing action and cleaning solution for superior cleaning results removing stubborn dirt and tough pet stains. Designed to easily clean carpet, upholstery, stairs, area rugs and more. Large capacity 3/4 gallon tank allows you to clean more area without emptying and filling the tank. For versatile cleaning, Bissell spot clean pro pet comes with pet tools including a stain trapper tool and a tough stain tool. Equipped with a long hose and 22 feet. Power cord to make it easy to clean hard to reach areas such a rugs, stairs, and upholstery. Includes a trial-size Bissell professional pet urine Eliminator + Oxy. Buying this product saves pets. Bissell proudly supports Bissell Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a Bissell product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.
